channel.title: dotnet core on Website of Chris König
channel.description: Recent content in dotnet core on Website of Chris König

item.title: Part 2 Logging: Correlation-ID with ASP.NET Core WebApi and NLog
item.description: A correlation ID is mostly the same like an transaction-id in the SQL World. I use it for logging and error analysis. Whithout a correlation id you are totaly lost in your log!
